TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintCapabilities extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义打印机的功能。

span.span: Defines the capabilities of a printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是特定类型的 XML 文档（称为*PrintCapabilities 文档*）的易于工作的表示形式。A object is an easy-to-work-with representation of a certain type of XML document called a *PrintCapabilities document*. 后者是所有打印机功能及其当前设置的快照。The latter is a snapshot of all of a printer's capabilities and their current settings. 例如，如果打印机支持彩色打印，则文档将包含一个 `` 元素，用于设置如何处理颜色输出。For example, if the printer supports color printing, then the document would have a `` element that sets out how color output will be handled. 元素依次由 对象的属性表示 。The element is, in turn, represented by the property of the object. 如果打印机不支持颜色，则 `` 文档中没有元素，并且属性的值 为 `null` 。If the printer does not support color, then there is no `` element in the document and the value of the property is `null`. PrintCapabilities 文档必须符合[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。The PrintCapabilities document must conform to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). 利用类，您的应用程序可以获得打印机的功能，而无需参与 XML 对象的任何直接读取 。The class enables your application to obtain a printer's capabilities without having to engage in any direct reading of XML objects. 适用于家庭和企业的文件和照片打印机的所有最常用功能都由 类封装。All of the most popular features of file and photo printers, for both home and business, are encapsulated by the class. 但[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)定义了许多其他不太常用的功能，并且可以对其进行扩展以处理专业打印设备的功能。But the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) defines many more, less common, features and it can be extended to handle features of specialty printing devices. 因此，虽然 和 类不能被继承，但你可以扩展[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)来识别在或类中不考虑的打印设备功能 。So, although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. **注意**使用采用 PrintCapabilities 文档（作为）参数的构造函数创建对象时 ，整个文档将存储在对象中的非公共字段中，其中包含的 XML 元素表示不是由类的任何公共属性表示的不太常见功能 。**Note** When the object is created with the constructor that takes a PrintCapabilities document (as a ) parameter, that entire document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上，如果生成 PrintCapabilities 文档的驱动程序使用[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的专用扩展，则该私下定义的标记也将作为非公共 PrintCapabilities 文档的一部分进行存储。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintCapabilities document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintCapabilities document. > [!CAUTION] > 命名空间中的类 不支持在 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试从这些应用程序类型之一中使用这些类可能会产生意外的问题，例如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果要从 Windows 窗体应用程序进行打印，请参阅 命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定特定打印机的功能，以及如何配置打印作业以利用这些功能。The following example shows how to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream xmlStream) cil managed

param.name: xmlStream
param.span: 描述打印机功能并符合打印架构的 XML 。

span.span: An XML that describes printer capabilities and conforms to the Print Schema.

summary.span: 使用指定打印机功能并符合 XML [打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 流（其中包含 PrintCapabilities 文档）初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an XML stream (that contains a PrintCapabilities document) that specifies printer capabilities and complies with the XML [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 整个 PrintCapabilities 文档存储在对象中的非公共字段中，其中包含的 XML 元素表示不是由类的任何公共属性表示的不太常用的功能 。The entire PrintCapabilities document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上，如果生成 PrintCapabilities 文档的驱动程序使用[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的专用扩展，则该私下定义的标记也将作为非公共 PrintCapabilities 文档的一部分进行存储。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintCapabilities document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintCapabilities document. 文档的私有部分（如果有）不由构造函数进行验证，但会验证所有**打印架构**定义的部分，包括不是由类的任何公共属性表示的部分 。The private parts of the document, if any, are not validated by the constructor, but all **Print Schema**-defined parts are validated, including the parts that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 因此， 即使所有对应于公共属性的 XML 标记都有效，也可能引发。Accordingly, the could be thrown even if all of the XML markup that corresponds to the public properties is valid.

span.span: is .
is not valid XML.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollationCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Collation)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机的排序功能。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the collation capabilities of a printer.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，标准打印机通过打印第一个副本的每一页，然后打印第二个副本的每一页等来排输出。A standard printer typically collates output by printing every page of the first copy, then every page of the second copy, and so on. 如果标准打印机未进行逐份打印，它将打印第一页的每个副本，然后打印第二页的每个副本，依次类推。When a standard printer does not collate, it prints every copy of the first page, then every copy of the second page, and so on. 某些打印机专门配备了整理箱。这些特殊设置的打印机的打印顺序可能不同于标准打印机的打印顺序;但结果相同：多页面打印作业的每个副本都按正确的顺序包含其所有页面，而无需手动排序。Some printers are specially equipped with collating bins. The printing sequence for these specially equipped printers may differ from those of standard printers; however the outcome is the same: each copy of a multi-paged print job contains all its pages in the proper sequence without manual sorting. 如果打印机不支持排序规则，则集合为空。If the printer does not support collation, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `DocumentCollate` 关键字，而不是 `JobCollateAllDocuments` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `DocumentCollate` keyword, not the `JobCollateAllDocuments` keyword. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定特定打印机的功能，以及如何配置打印作业以利用这些功能。The following example shows how to use this property to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeviceFontSubstitutionCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of DeviceFontSubstitution)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机是否可以用基于设备的字体替换基于计算机的字体，以及如何进行替换。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify whether and how a printer can substitute device-based fonts for computer-based fonts.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持设备字体替换，则集合为空。If the printer does not support device font substitution, the collection is empty. 如果支持字体替换，则驱动程序应同时包含 集合中的和值。If it does support font substitution, the driver should include both the and values in the collection. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `PageDeviceFontSubstitution` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageDeviceFontSubstitution` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DuplexingCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Duplexing)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机是否可以执行双面打印，以及如何执行双面打印。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify whether and how a printer can perform two-sided printing.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持双工，则集合为空。If the printer does not support duplexing, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously` 关键字，而不是 `DocumentDuplex` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentDuplex` keyword. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定特定打印机的功能，以及如何配置打印作业以利用这些功能。The following example shows how to use this property to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputBinCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of InputBin)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指示使用哪个送纸盒（纸盒）。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate what input bin (paper tray) is used.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设备支持该功能，则此属性表示[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的功能 `JobInputBin` ; 否则，它表示 `DocumentInputBin` 如果支持该功能，则为; 否则为 `PageInputBin` 。This property represents the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s feature `JobInputBin`, if that feature is supported by the device; otherwise, it represents `DocumentInputBin`, if that feature is supported; otherwise, it represents `PageInputBin`. 如果打印机不支持其中的任何功能，则集合为空。If the printer does not support any of these features, the collection is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MaxCopyCount As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> MaxCopyCount { Nullable<int> get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设备在一次打印作业中所能打印的最大副本数。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the maximum number of copies that the device can print in a single print job.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，它指定打印机所能打印的最大副本数。

span.span: A nullable value that specifies the maximum number of copies that a printer can print.

value.span: 如果设备驱动程序不报告最大值，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the device driver does not report a maximum.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `JobCopiesAllDocuments` 关键字，而不是 `DocumentCopiesAllPages` 关键字或 `PageCopies` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobCopiesAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentCopiesAllPages` keyword, or the `PageCopies` keyword. 如果打印机可以打印不限数量的副本，则属性值为9999。If the printer can print unlimited copies, the property value is 9999.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrientedPageMediaHeight As Nullable(Of Double)
public: property Nullable<double> OrientedPageMediaHeight { Nullable<double> get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示页面中成像区域高度的值，其中高度表示与页面方向相对应的垂直尺寸。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the height of the imageable area on a page, where height means the vertical dimension relative to the page's orientation.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，该值表示打印机可在页面中打印的区域的高度（以像素为单位，即以 1/96 英寸递增）。

span.span: A nullable value indicating the height, in pixels, which are 1/96 inch increments, of the area on a page that the printer is capable of printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数打印机都必须将 unprinted 区域置于页面边缘，以防碳粉量进入移动纸张的打印机部件。Most printers must leave an unprinted area along the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的关键字的**ImageableSizeHeight**属性 `PageImageableSize` 。This property corresponds to the **ImageableSizeHeight** property of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageImageableSize` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrientedPageMediaWidth As Nullable(Of Double)
public: property Nullable<double> OrientedPageMediaWidth { Nullable<double> get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示页面中成像区域宽度的值，其中宽度表示与页面方向相对应的水平尺寸。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the width of the imageable area on a page, where width means the horizontal dimension relative to the page's orientation.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，该值表示打印机可在页面中打印的区域的宽度（以像素为单位，即以 1/96 英寸递增）。

span.span: A nullable value indicating the width, in pixels, which are 1/96 inch increments, of the area on a page that the printer is capable of printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数打印机都必须将 unprinted 区域置于页面边缘，以防碳粉量进入移动纸张的打印机部件。Most printers must leave an unprinted area along the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 此属性与 `ImageableSizeWidth` [打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的关键字的属性相对应 `PageImageableSize` 。This property corresponds to the `ImageableSizeWidth` property of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageImageableSize` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputColorCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of OutputColor)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指定打印机对于带有彩色和灰阶内容的打印方法。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that specify the ways in which a printer can print content with color and shades of gray.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持输出颜色选项，则集合为空。If the printer does not support output color options, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `PageOutputColor` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputColor` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputQualityCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of OutputQuality)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指示打印机支持的输出质量的类型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate the types of output quality the printer supports.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如， 枚举具有 、和质量的值以及 其他值 。For example, the enumeration has values for , , and quality, among others. 如果打印机不支持输出质量选择，则集合为空。If the printer does not support output quality selection, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `PageOutputQuality` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputQuality` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageBorderlessCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageBorderless)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指示打印机是否可以打印到介质的边缘。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate whether the printer can print up to the edge of the media.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数激光和喷墨打印机不支持无边框打印。Most laser and inkjet printers do not support borderless printing. 它们必须允许 unprinted 的边距，以防碳粉量进入移动纸张的打印机部件。They must allow an unprinted margin to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the paper. 然而，许多照片式打印机都支持无边框打印。Many photographic printers, however, do support borderless printing. 如果打印机不支持无边框打印，则集合为空。If the printer does not support borderless printing, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `PageBorderless` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageBorderless` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageImageableArea As PageImageableArea
public: property System::Printing::PageImageableArea ^ PageImageableArea { System::Printing::PageImageableArea ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象用于表示打印机所能使用页面的区域。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the area of a page that the printer can use.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于指定成像区域左上角的距离（以像素为单位，即 1/96 英寸为一个单位）。

span.span: A object that specifies the distance, in pixels (units of 1/96 inch), of the upper-left corner of the imageable area.

value.span: 垂直距离是从纸的上边开始测量的，水平距离是从纸的左边开始测量的。

span.span: The vertical distance is measured from the top edge of the paper and the horizontal distance is measured from the left edge.

value.span: 返回值还指定成像区域的宽度和高度。

span.span: The return value also specifies the width and height of the imageable area.

value.span: 如果打印机的驱动程序不报告成像区域，则此属性为 null。

span.span: If the printer driver does not report an imageable area, then this property is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数激光打印机和喷墨打印机都必须允许页面边缘周围有一个 unprinted 的边距，以防碳粉量进入移动纸张的打印机部件。Most laser and inkjet printers must allow an unprinted margin around the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 然而，许多照片式打印机都可以使用整个页面来打印图像。Many photographic printers, however, can use the entire page to print an image.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageMediaSizeCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageMediaSize)

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象用于标识打印机支持的纸张和介质的尺寸。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that identify the paper and media sizes that a printer supports.
A of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageMediaTypeCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageMediaType)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的纸张和其他介质的类型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify what types of paper and other media a printer supports.

value.span: 值（这些值用于指定打印介质，如卡片纸、标签、普通纸或照片纸）的一个 。

span.span: A of values specifying the print media, such as card stock, label, plain, or photographic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持媒体类型选择，则集合为空。If the printer does not support media type selection, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `PageMediaType` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageMediaType` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageOrderCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageOrder)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指示打印机是否能够从前往后和/或从后往前打印多页文档。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate whether a printer is capable of printing multiple-page documents from front-to-back, back-to-front, or both ways.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持页面顺序选择，则集合为空。If the printer does not support page order selection, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `JobPageOrder` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobPageOrder` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageOrientationCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageOrientation)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的页面方向的类型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify what types of page orientation a printer supports.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持页面方向选择，则集合为空。If the printer does not support page orientation selection, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `PageOrientation` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOrientation` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageResolutionCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageResolution)

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象用于标识打印机支持的页面分辨率的等级。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that identify what levels of page resolution the printer supports.
A of objects.

value.span: 每一个值以定性值和/或每英寸点数值来表示页面分辨率。

span.span: Each value represents a page resolution as a qualitative value, a dots-per-inch value, or both.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageScalingFactorRange As PageScalingFactorRange
public: property System::Printing::PageScalingFactorRange ^ PageScalingFactorRange { System::Printing::PageScalingFactorRange ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取打印机可在页面中放大或缩小打印图像的最大和最小百分比。

span.span: Gets the maximum and minimum percentages by which a printer can enlarge or reduce the print image on a page.

value.span: 具有 和 属性（包含表示百分比的 值）的 对象。

span.span: A object with and properties holding values that represent percentages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性通常表示[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `PageScaling` 关键字。This property generally represents the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageScaling` keyword. 但有些复杂，如下所示。But there are some complexities as follows. - 如果 PrintCapabilities 文档没有 `PageScaling` 元素，或者它有一个元素，但它的**CustomSquare**和**自定义**选项均未定义，则 属性为 null。If the PrintCapabilities document does not have a `PageScaling` element, or it has one, but neither its **CustomSquare** nor **Custom** options are defined; then the property is null. - 在所有其他情况下，属性的行为如下所示。In all other cases, the property's behavior is as follows. 该 属性的对象的属性 为以下值中的最小值。The property of the property's object is the smallest of the following values. - **MinValue** `PageScalingScaleWidth` 提供**自定义**选项的**ScaleWidth**值的数据类型的 MinValue 属性 `ScoredProperty` 。The **MinValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleWidth` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option's **ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`. - **MinValue** `PageScalingScaleHeight` 提供**自定义**选项的**ScaleHeight**值的数据类型的 MinValue 属性 `ScoredProperty` 。The **MinValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleHeight` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option's **ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`. - **MinValue** `PageScalingScale` 提供**CustomSquare**选项**刻度**值的数据类型的 MinValue 属性 `ScoredProperty` 。The **MinValue** property of the `PageScalingScale` datatype that provides the value of the **CustomSquare** option's **Scale** `ScoredProperty`. 该 属性的对象的属性 为以下值中的最大值。The property of the property's object is the largest of the following values. - **MaxValue** `PageScalingScaleWidth` 提供**自定义**选项的**ScaleWidth**值的数据类型的类型属性 `ScoredProperty` 。The **MaxValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleWidth` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option's **ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`. - **MaxValue** `PageScalingScaleHeight` 提供**自定义**选项的**ScaleHeight**值的数据类型的类型属性 `ScoredProperty` 。The **MaxValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleHeight` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option's **ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`. - 数据**MaxValue**类型的 CustomSquare 属性 `PageScalingScale` ，它提供了 " **CustomSquare** " 选项的**刻度**值 `ScoredProperty` 。The **MaxValue** property of the `PageScalingScale` datatype that provides the value of the **CustomSquare** option's **Scale** `ScoredProperty`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PagesPerSheetCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Integer)

summary.span: 获取整数的集合，每一个整数用于标识用户可以选择在一页纸的单面上所打印的页数。

span.span: Gets a collection of integers, each identifying the number of pages that a user can choose to print on a single side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 值的一个 ，这些值表示打印机支持的、用于在每一面上打印多页的选项。

span.span: A of values representing the options that a printer supports for printing more than one page per side.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数打印机仅支持有限数量的特定选项，如1、2、4、6、9和16页（每面）。Most printers support only a limited number of specific options, such as 1, 2, 4, 6, 9, and 16 pages per side. 如果打印机在每张纸上都不支持多页，则集合为空。If the printer does not support multiple pages per sheet, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于 `PagesPerSheet ScoredProperty` [打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` 关键字的，而不是 `DocumentNUp` 关键字。This property corresponds to the `PagesPerSheet ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PagesPerSheetDirectionCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PagesPerSheetDirection)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的、用于在每一张纸的单面上呈现多页的模式。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify what patterns a printer supports for presenting multiple pages on a single side of a sheet of paper.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，某些打印机可以从左到右行显示页面，行从上到下堆积。For example, some printers can present pages in left-to-right rows with the rows stacked top-to-bottom. 某些打印机支持的另一种模式是从右到左排列行的从右到左行。Another pattern, which some printers support, is right-to-left rows with the rows stacked bottom-to-top. 如果打印机在每张纸上都不支持多页，则集合为空。If the printer does not support multiple pages per sheet, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于 `PresentationDirection` [打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的关键字的子功能 `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` ，而不是 `DocumentNUp` 关键字。This property corresponds to the `PresentationDirection` subfeature of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PhotoPrintingIntentCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PhotoPrintingIntent)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的、用于打印照片的质量选项。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the quality options the printer supports for printing photographs.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持照片质量选项，则集合为空。If the printer does not support options for photographic quality, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `PagePhotoPrintingIntent` 。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PagePhotoPrintingIntent`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaplingCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Stapling)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的自动装订的类型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the types of automatic stapling that a printer supports.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持装订，则集合为空。If the printer does not support stapling, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `JobStapleAllDocuments` 关键字，而不是 `DocumentStaple` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobStapleAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentStaple` keyword. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定特定打印机的功能，以及如何配置打印作业以利用这些功能。The following example shows how to use this property to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TrueTypeFontModeCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of TrueTypeFontMode)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的、用于处理 TrueType 字体的方法。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the methods that a printer supports for handling TrueType fonts.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持 TrueType 字体的任何特殊处理方法，则该集合为空。If the printer does not support any method of special handling for TrueType fonts, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 `PageTrueTypeFontMode` 关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageTrueTypeFontMode` keyword.
